SPOTTER.name: Spotter
SPOTTER.description: Spot enemy equipment through walls. Aiming down sights highlights them for your team. Hack enemy Claymore, Proximity Mines, C4 and Trophy Systems

RESUPPLY.name: Resupply
RESUPPLY.description: Start with an additional Lethal. Recharge equipment over 30 seconds

FAST_HANDS.name: Fast Hands
FAST_HANDS.description: Reload, use equipment, and swap weapons faster

FOCUS.name: Focus
FOCUS.description: Reduce flinch when aiming down sights and extend Hold Breath duration

COLD_BLOODED.name: Cold Blooded
COLD_BLOODED.description: Undetectable by AI targeting systems, and thermal optics. Does not trigger High Alert warning. Does not highlight in enemy Tactical Camera, Recon Drones, and Spotter Scopes
